distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for pmix fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-41915: Fixed a potential vulnerability where a `chown` may follow a
  user-created link (bsc#1215190).

- Install pmix-plugin-munge if munge is installed.
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: OpenPMIx PMIx before 4.2.6 and 5.0.x before 5.0.1 allows attackers to obtain ownership of arbitrary files via a race condition during execution of library code with UID 0.
notes.title: CVE description
